content: hiver cowl my go to accessory from fall to spring is this classy cowl that i wear over my t-shirt as soon as the first fall chilly evening appears and under my coat throughout the winter i can not rave enough about this simple cable design and the understated estonian braid and lovely i-cord edging 1 www unrulystitch com- instagram @unrulystitch hiver cowl difficulty level intermediate ■ 6mm /us 10 needles ■ rest will be materials determined at a later ◆ quince & co speckled puffin super bulky weight time #6 286-296yds/262-271g or any super bulky ○ 3/3 lc 3/3 left weight to match gauge cable slip 3 st to ◆ us10/6mm circular knitting needles 16 inch and 24 cn and hold in front inch of work k 3 st k 3 ◆ crochet hook st from cn ◆ cable needle ○ cn cable needle ◆ tapestry needle ◆ scissors stitch key us co cast on links k knit stretchy bind off https //www youtube com/watch v=ol8az p purl 7z_iss k2tog tbl knit 2 together through back loop gauge unblocked m1pw increase make 1 purlwise us10/6mm needles bobble bind off k6 p2 k6 p2 k6= 4 inches/10cm 20 rounds = 4 inches/10cm 3/3 lc 3/3 left cable slip 3 st to cn and hold in front of work k 3 st k 3 st from cn 4/4 lc 4/4 left cable slip 4 st to cn and hold in front of work k 4 st k 4 st from cn 2 www unrulystitch com- instagram @unrulystitch pattern with your us10/6mm needles co 80 sts using the long tail cast on place bor marker and join in the round r 1-3 p2 k6 all around r4 *p2 3/3 lc* repeat around r5-10 p all p st k all k st for non cable rounds work stitches as they present themselves purl all purl stitches and knit all knit stitches r11 repeat round 4 r12-17 repeat round 5 r18 *m1pw p2 3/3 lc* repeat around you will now have 3 p sts in between your cables r19-24 repeat round 5 r25 *p3 m1pw 3/3 lc* repeat around you will have 4 purl sts in between your cables r26-27 repeat round 5 r28 *p4 k1 m1 k4 m1 k1* repeat around you will have 8 k sts for your next cable r29-31 repeat round 5 r32 *p1 m1pw p3 4/4 lc* repeat around you will have 5 purl sts in between your cables r33-34 repeat round 5 3 www unrulystitch com- instagram @unrulystitch pattern r35 *m1pw p5 m1pw k8* repeat around you will have 7 purl st in between your cables r36-38 repeat round 5 r39 *p1 m1pw p5 m1pw p1 4/4 lc* repeat around you will have 9 purl sts in between your cables r40-45 repeat round 5 r46 *p1 m1pw p7 m1pw p1 4/4 lc * repeat around you will have 11 purl sts in between your cables r47-52 repeat round 5 r53 *p11 4/4 lc * repeat around r54-55 repeat
